items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 55 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 12!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 25 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 6!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 65 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 14!
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 40 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 9!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 180 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 37!

Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 10 different venues categorized as a Brewery, Cidery or Meadery. Visit 5 more for Level 3!

As the hub of the town's social scene, your local pub has what you're craving. Be sure to stop by for a pint or two! That's a beer at 20 different venues with the categories of Pub, Irish Pub or Gastropub. Visit 5 more for Level 5!

user.bio: Tech follower, beer drinker, and sports fan.

items.checkin_comment: Master - the name makes it impossible to find on Untappd! Average semi-dark pivo, drank it in Prague. Works very well with spicy Gulasch.
I think this is the Cambodia export version of this beer?

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 35 distinct venues!
